text: Peter Malmgren (born January 21, 1971) is a Swedish professional golfer. Malmgren was born in Falsterbo, Sweden.http://www.foxsports.com/golf/peter- malmgren-player He turned professional in 1995 and won the Nordic Golf League ranking in 2004.Ranking 2004, Nordic Golf League, accessed 1 September 2016 His best result on the Challenge Tour was runner-up in the 2001 Nykredit Danish Open.Nykredit Danish Open, OWGR, accessed 1 September 2016 ==Professional wins (2)== ===Nordic League wins (2)=== *2004 Hansabank Baltic Open *2012 Freja PGA Championship ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Swedish male golfers Category:European Tour golfers Category:Sportspeople from Malmö Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Peter Malmgren
